scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m 'update' && git push
scripts.fetch-from-main-to-local__and__merge: git fetch origin && git merge origin/main
scripts.safety-reload: pm2 reload ecosystem.config.js --update-env && sleep 5 && pm2 logs
scripts.reload-with-dependencies-update: npm i && pm2 reload ecosystem.config.js --update-env && sleep 3 && pm2 logs
scripts.critical-graceful-update: pm2 stop ecosystem.config.js && npm i && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js && sleep 10 && pm2 logs
scripts.full-restart: pm2 stop ecosystem.config.js && pm2 delete ecosystem.config.js && npm i && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js && sleep 15 && pm2 logs
